metadata.title: CVE-2024-22116 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An administrator with restricted permissions can exploit the scriptexecution functionality within the Monitoring Hosts section. The lack ofdefault escaping for script parameters enabled this user ability to executearbitrary code via the Ping script, thereby compromising infrastructure.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
